title: FASTENINGS OR ATTACHMENTS OF FOOTWEAR; LACES IN GENERAL
definition_statement: This place covers: Equipment of the shoe e.g. laces, eyelets, cleats, studs.

title: Shoe lacing fastenings  (garment fastening devices A41F)
definition_statement: This place covers: Every fastening system including at least one lace and concerning the lace, e.g. a special way of lacing, a specific position of the lace on the shoe, several laces used, etc.

title: Hooks for laces  (making from sheet metal B21D53/46); Guards for hooks
informative_references: Making of Hooks from metal sheet
definition_statement: This place covers: Hooks for lacing, along the upper, generally the lace joining together the hooks in the lateral part with the hooks situated on the medial part of the upper.

title: Eyelets  (machines for setting eyelets A43D100/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: Holes in the upper generally to help the lace to bring together the lateral part with the medial part of the upper

title: Holding-devices for laces
definition_statement: This place covers: Systems to hold lace(s) in tighten position.

title: Laces; Laces in general for garments made of textiles, leather, or plastics
definition_statement: This place covers: The lace itself.

title: Other fastenings specially adapted for shoes  (dress fastenings in general A44B)
definition_statement: This place covers: Any fastening that is not a lace. Still some of the documents can have a lace, in case they relate to footwear provided with more than one fastening system.

title: {Combined fastenings, e.g. to accelerate undoing or fastening}
special_rules: If one of the two fastenings is a lace, classification should be given in  and sub-groups.
definition_statement: This place covers: Combination of two different fastenings e.g. a lace for precision lacing of a boot, and a zipper, for quick release of the boot.

title: Ornamental buckles or other ornaments for shoes, with fastening function  (buckles in general A44B11/00)
Wear-resisting attachments
definition_statement: This place covers: Additional device(s) attached on the shoe to protect against wear.

title: Non-skid devices or attachments  (apparatus for climbing poles, trees, or the like A63B27/00)
informative_references: Sport footwear  Football/soccer footwear  Soles made anti skid, either by impregnation, either by antiskid devices monolithic to the sole, or multilayer soles, with a part of it in contact with the ground, but excluding the cleats, and studs , ,  Apparatus for climbing poles, trees, or the like  Snowshoes
definition_statement: This place covers: Additional device(s) attached to a footwear to improve friction.

title: Attachments for footwear, not provided for in other groups of this subclass
definition_statement: This place covers: Any attachment to a footwear not covered by the other groups, e.g. a plate with the name of the user, a tool to clean a golf club with the foot, an electronic device, any attachment not integrated in the footwear.
